name.th: เครื่องบันทึกหน้าจอ CapCut

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Free and powerful screen recorder from CapCut. Record, edit and share all in one package. Got your back for recording in any situation!

CapCut Screen Recorder is now live! 
This powerful tool empowers you with the ability to record, edit, and share-all for FREE! Easily capture your screen, tabs, windows, and even include your webcam with just a few clicks.
No need to worry about payments, and you get a solid 1-hour recording time.
Whether you're conducting online classes, showcasing product demos, or discussing work matters, CapCut Screen Recorder gets you covered anytime right from your browser.
When you've finished recording, elevate it to the next level with the CapCut online video editor. Enhance your content with a diverse array of stickers, effects, subtitles, transitions, filters, templates, and more to make your content truly stand out!

Key Features:
From recording to production all in one tool
- Record the entire screen
- Record browser tabs
- Record documents & apps
- Capture screen along with microphone and webcam
- Edit your recordings in CapCut with one-click access
- Injected UI that is nice and easy-to-use

Free recording and video management
- Free recording
- Up to 1 hour of recording per session
- Automatically save recordings to CapCut cloud space for easy viewing, editing, downloading, and sharing
- Share to multiple social media platforms with one-click
- TikTok
- YouTube
- Facebook
- Instagram
